name: Escalation (itch)
description:
Escalation

The Devastation were a small political party in Japan but after failing to take control of Japan peacefully in 2042, they took power by violence and aggression leading to the Devastation to have an influence in China, Korea and Taiwan. The following year violent revolutions took a grip on those countries leading them join the Devastation Order, the year after in 2043 they began an invasion into Russia and into India, within days the countries had fallen to the orders hand with a population of three billion people they could be unstoppable, the United Nations try peace, but they were told that peace is only a solution when only one person was in charge. In the year 2044, The Devastation Order began to arm itself for war, NATO did the same and in 2045, The Devastation Order began an invasion into Europe, leading to all out war across the European continent.
